PHRASE.LANG: Available ONLY for the 2010 holiday season, this happy snowman will create a flurry of snowflakes wherever you place him. Happy Holidays from Codename Games! [#Legal]

Disponible UNIQUEMENT durant la période des fêtes 2010, ce bonhomme de neige joyeux créera un tourbillon de flocons de neige où que vous le placiez.Joyeuses Fêtes de la part de Codename Games ! [#Legal]
Available ONLY for the 2010 holiday season, this happy snowman will create a flurry of snowflakes wherever you place him. Happy Holidays from Codename Games! [#Legal]
